changes.text: Improve Duplicate Files utility UI.
Replaced old filtering system, no UI changes.
Improve Clarity Regarding Deleting Multiple Places for Files.
Improve Plex Responsiveness in Desktop.
URLs not opening.
VLC issue when reading filenames.
Playback button not working when Player is set to Windows Default.
Setting Default Poster.
Removed Queue from taskbar.
Watch status for episodes not updating.
Pressing F5 in the multiple-files views (e.g. in the unrecognised tab) refreshes the view.
Added support for VLC playlists.
Moved to .net 6.
Improve image download capabilities in Desktop.
Fix scrobbling in VLC.
Fix file deletion dialog.
Fix opening urls from desktop.
Dozens of minor fixes to improve overall stability.
Pressing F5 in the multiple-files views (e.g. in the unrecognised tab) refreshes the view.
Quality of life improvements to the file delete files form.
Fix the "Run on import" checkbox in the renamer tab not loading the correct value on start.
Add ED2K uri to unrecognized and file search.
Implement Multi-select and improvements to File Search Utility.
Add back the enabled checkbox for Renamers.
Refactored Renamer system.
Fix Visibility on Rehash.
Remove Cloud.
Refactored Plugin system.
Refactored Renamer system.

Fix Settings load on first run.
Fix Streaming.
Fix a small positioning problem in ImportFolder Form.
Fix an issue where settings would not load properly.
Fix Playback in Desktop.
Add method to bypass initial show filter for unrecognized files.
Force unrecognized files to use the AniDB ID for searching after adding a new show.
Allow Special Episode Type ranges in Manual Sorting.
Logic improvements for episode validation for episode ranges.
Remove TvDB Thumbnails as they are no longer needed.
Fixed sorting in New Series window.

Add searching functionality to Multiple Files Utility.
Change LongToFileSizeConverter output, enforcing 2 digits after the dot.

Speed up file deletion in batches.
Properly continue when deleting many files at once.
Fix sorting by size.
Fix Unrecognized Files Search.
Fix sorting in Duplicate Files.
Fix ordering of files.

Unrecognized Utility - Search for AniDB's AnimeID.
Make AVDump not require mapped folders.
Allow the user to select preferred MPC client.
Fix Searching in Desktop.
Default to Full Series View, not Metro.
Fix an issue when searching using more than three letters.
Add additional logging for unrecognized files.
Add additional logging for recognized files.
Removed unnecessary rereshing from unrecognized series.
Update Plex settings and add a refresh button as an async call.
Update Shoko Server "unable to connect" message a little more verbose.
changed Trakt auth UI.
changed TvDB linking system and UI.

Fix an issue with the AVDump utility when selecting multiple files.

Removed MAL access and syncing.

Give a reason when the client can't connect to server.
If the TvDB Episode Overview is not available, use the AniDB Episode Overview if available.

Fixed an error in TvDB linking form.
Fixed an issue where the Series MAL buttons did not work.
Fixed an issue where TvDB information was not updated properly.
Add proper logging throughout Desktop.
Only show a single date if Start and End date are the same.
Update installer with permissions setup.
Make sure "image loading error" placeholder image is shown throughout Desktop.
Fixed issue when resuming playlist playback.

Fixed issue with deleting group filter conditions.
Fixed various memory leaks in desktop.

Add plex sync settings to Shoko Desktop.

Add plex UI interaction for the plex syncing added into Shoko Server.

Add flags for chaptered files.
Make a proper delete file window for Multiple Files.
Nep Nep the corrupted images!.
Add natural sorting to some utilities.
Support Dual and Multi Audio in Multiple Files Utility.
Make Manually Linked Files Sorted Naturally.
Use a FlexibleMessageBox for all MessageBoxes.
Show local and remote file location in utilities.
Cleanup and Fix Default Sorting of GroupFilters without sorting.
Improve File Quality Preferences.
Remove Downloads tab and move contents to utilities.
Improvements to the Recommended To Watch Dashboard.
Update Link strings.
Update form now has proper version comparison and will only report update available if version found online is higher.
Improvements to the Recommended To Watch Dashboard.
Make filtering on titles obey languages better.
Make background series searching more aesthetically smooth.

Fixed Duplicate File Control, amongst other LongPath errors.
Updated Language Strings, Fixed UI Issues.

Make the Delete Files with Preferences more reliable.
Speed up, clean up, Fix some bugs, fix group filter saving, editing, and deleting.

Metro series view page can now be used in place of the usual series view page and is the default. This display can be toggled

Show more detail on Unrecognized files tab, and allow sorting by all columns. Allow filtering on import folder
